00058 // DVS 'exception' class--------------------------------------------------------
00059 
00060 // ---Extended DVS error numbers------------------------------------------------
00061 
00062 #define DVSEXCEPTION_NUM_BASE (-1000)
00063 #define DVSEXCEPTION_NUM_INCR (-1)
00064 
00065 //#define DVSEXCEPTION_UNSTATED          (DVSEXCEPTION_NUM_BASE+(0   * DVSEXCEPTION_NUM_INCR))
00066 #define DVSEXCEPTION_INTERNALERROR     (DVSEXCEPTION_NUM_BASE+(0   * DVSEXCEPTION_NUM_INCR))
00067 #define DVSEXCEPTION_CANNOTOPENHANDLE  (DVSEXCEPTION_NUM_BASE+(1   * DVSEXCEPTION_NUM_INCR))
00068 #define DVSEXCEPTION_CANNOTCLOSEHANDLE (DVSEXCEPTION_NUM_BASE+(2   * DVSEXCEPTION_NUM_INCR))
00069 #define DVSEXCEPTION_NULLHANDLE        (DVSEXCEPTION_NUM_BASE+(3   * DVSEXCEPTION_NUM_INCR))
00070 #define DVSEXCEPTION_CARDALREADYUSED   (DVSEXCEPTION_NUM_BASE+(4   * DVSEXCEPTION_NUM_INCR))
00071 #define DVSEXCEPTION_FIFONOTSTARTED    (DVSEXCEPTION_NUM_BASE+(5   * DVSEXCEPTION_NUM_INCR))
00072 #define DVSEXCEPTION_BADARGUMENTS      (DVSEXCEPTION_NUM_BASE+(6   * DVSEXCEPTION_NUM_INCR))
00073 #define DVSEXCEPTION_FIFOEMPTY         (DVSEXCEPTION_NUM_BASE+(7   * DVSEXCEPTION_NUM_INCR))
00074 #define DVSEXCEPTION_FIFOINUSE         (DVSEXCEPTION_NUM_BASE+(8   * DVSEXCEPTION_NUM_INCR))
00075 
00076 //#define DVSEXCEPTION_NUM_ERRCODES  10
00077 
00078 #define DVSEXCEPTION_S_UNDEFINED     "Undefined DVSException extended error code."
00079

00081 // ---DVSException base class------------------------------------------------------

00087 class DVSException : public std::exception
00088 {
00089   friend class DVSCard;
00090   friend class DVSHandle;
00091 
00092   private:
00093     int number;  
00094     char *msg;   
00097   protected:
00113     DVSException(int errcode, const char *context, std::exception *e, char *errmsg = NULL) throw ();
00114 
00115   public:
00116     ~DVSException();
00117 
00126     DVSException(const DVSException &e) throw ();
00127 
00131     const char *what() const throw();
00135     const int get_errnum() const throw();
00136 };

00144 class DVSDriverException : public DVSException
00145 { public:
00156     DVSDriverException(int errcode, const char *context, std::exception *e) throw ()
00157       : DVSException(errcode, context, e, sv_geterrortext(errcode)) {};
00158 
00159     DVSDriverException(const DVSDriverException &e) throw () : DVSException(e) {};
00160 };
00161 
00173 class DVSNullHandleException : public DVSException
00174 { public:
00175     DVSNullHandleException(const char *context, std::exception *e) throw ()
00176       : DVSException(DVSEXCEPTION_NULLHANDLE, context, e, "Attempt made to use DVSHandle object when its DVSCard parent has been deleted") {};
00177 
00178     DVSNullHandleException(const DVSNullHandleException &e) throw () : DVSException(e) {};
00179 };
00180 
00189 class DVSCannotOpenHandleException : public DVSException
00190 { public:
00191     DVSCannotOpenHandleException(const char *context, std::exception *e) throw ()
00192       : DVSException(DVSEXCEPTION_CANNOTOPENHANDLE, context, e, "Could not open handle to DVS driver. No card present? Driver problem? In use by other processes?") {};
00193 
00194     DVSCannotOpenHandleException(const DVSCannotOpenHandleException &e) throw () : DVSException(e) {};
00195 };

00284 { public:

01051 // ===Internal Static member instantiations==============================================
01052 
01053 #ifdef DVSCLASSESLIB_INTERNAL_INCLUDE
01054 
01055 #define LOCK(  mutex, mutexname, context) /*cout<<">>LOCK "<<mutexname<<" : "<<context<<endl<<flush;*/ if (pthread_mutex_lock(&mutex)) throw DVSInternalErrorException(context " : locking " mutexname, NULL); try {
01056 #define UNLOCK(mutex, mutexname, context) } catch (...) { pthread_mutex_unlock(&mutex); throw; } if (pthread_mutex_unlock(&mutex)) throw DVSInternalErrorException(context " : unlocking " mutexname, NULL); /*cout<<">>UNLOCK "<<mutexname<<" : "<<context<<endl<<flush;*/
01057 
01058 #define LOCK_DVS(context)         LOCK(DVSCard::dvs_mutex,     "dvs driver access mutex", context)
01059 #define UNLOCK_DVS(context)     UNLOCK(DVSCard::dvs_mutex,     "dvs driver access mutex", context)
01060 #define LOCK_CLASSES(context)     LOCK(DVSCard::classes_mutex, "internal mutex",          context)
01061 #define UNLOCK_CLASSES(context) UNLOCK(DVSCard::classes_mutex, "internal mutex",          context)
01062 
01063 #endif
